3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with clean geometry and a clear isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Significant layout errors: the entire staircase area on the right is missing, and the bathroom/entry partition logic is severely simplified or incorrectly merged.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches room types (kitchen, bedroom, living) well, but bathroom fixtures are missing as the room itself was removed/altered.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent rendering quality with clean lighting and no artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Entire staircase section (right side of 2D plan) is completely absent in the 3D model.
Bathroom/laundry partitions and entry hallway geometry differ significantly from the source layout.

summary: A visually high-quality 3D transformation that accurately places furniture and kitchen elements, though it fails to render the staircase and bathroom partitions as specified in the 2D plan.
